title: Ross Kemp: On the NHS Frontline
overview: Ross Kemp follows frontline medical staff at Milton Keynes Hospital Trust as they prepare for and face the coronavirus pandemic. He witnesses the sacrifices staff and their families are making in their battle against the disease, and follows the journey of patients initially admitted into the hospital's respiratory ward with mild symptoms, through to the Intensive Care Units where those with severe Covid-19 fight for their lives.
